title: PMS 2.0 575 - OVERREACTION MONDAY, NFL Week 18 Recap, CFB National Championship Preview, Ian Rapoport, Darius Butler, Jeff Saturday, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, AJ Hawk, and the boys overreact to everything in the last week of the NFL season as the playoffs are finally set and we know who's in the dance. They discuss the Colts somehow not making the playoffs after laying an egg in Jacksonville, Big Ben and the Steelers getting in for Seven's Last Ride, Brandon Staley's decision making last night that has a lot of people wondering about why the Chargers didn't make the playoffs, and all the different coaches that have been fired today with the biggest shocker coming from Miami as they let go of Brian Flores, as well as Mike Zimmer, Vic Fangio, Matt Nagy, and who else might be on the hot seat. Joining the progrum to discuss all the different happenings around the NFL and what to expect from the playoffs is NFL Senior Insider, and friend of the show, Ian Rapoport (22:50-45:07). Next, 9 year NFL vet at Defensive Back, host of the Man-To-Man Podcast, friend of the progrum, Darius Butler, joins Pat and AJ to give his biggest takeaways from the final week of the NFL season, and who he likes in the playoffs (1:08:39-1:25:01). Lastly, Super Bowl Champion, 6x Pro Bowler, 4X All-Pro, ESPN NFL Analyst, Jeff Saturday joins Pat and AJ to chat about what went wrong with the Colts yesterday, how big of an impact David Bakhtiari's return has on the Packers, if the AB situation will prove to be a distraction for the Bucs moving forward, and his thoughts on all of the first round playoff games (1:26:10-1:47:46). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
